page.title: 10MY FAVOURITE GAMES,BOLTON.
page.content: My favourite games are playing two balls and just skipping.To play two balls you need two tennis balls, you throw one ball and as it's bouncing back off the wall,you throw the other one at the same time you catch the first ball.There are some chants to them,here are a few: Penny for chips, Penny for peas, And don't forget the vinegar please. I think that's my favourite chant. Here's another: Tiger Tim swallowed a pin, So that's the end of Tiger Tim. And here's another: I say plainly, I say over, I say uppsy.
